Reference

Main functions

wflow_start()

Start a new workflowr project

wflow_build()

Build the site

wflow_status()

Report status of workflowr project

wflow_publish()

Publish the site

Managing Git and GitHub

Functions to perform local Git commands. Not needed if you’d prefer to run Git commands in the Terminal.

wflow_git_commit()

Commit files

wflow_git_config()

Configure Git settings

wflow_git_pull()

Pull files from remote repository

wflow_git_push()

Push files to remote repository

wflow_git_remote()

Manage remote Git repositories

Other functions

wflow_html()

Convert to a workflowr HTML document

wflow_open()

Open R Markdown analysis file(s)

wflow_remove()

Remove files

wflow_site()

Custom site generator for workflowr websites

wflow_update()

Update a workflowr project

wflow_view()

View research website locally
